amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to allow the Navy to retire nine Littoral Combat Ships.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allow the Navy to retire nine Littoral Combat Ships.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A012) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 208 - 221 (Roll no. 319).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A012) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A012) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 208 - 221 (Roll no. 319).
